Review_Text: This is a very inspiring series with a very innovative way to tell the stories behind some of the greatest showbiz people today. The freshness of other people telling how they influenced their lives. Really touching.
Excellent series. You won't regret watching any of the episodes.
It is awesome... the way to tell stories is amazing for my best of this year.

Review_title: Dear Apple TV+ please pay attention because you are not doing well.
Review_Text: Greetings from another country, one where most of these people are of zero relevance and matter little to nothingNot really much to like here, I tried an episode with one of the few people that could be interesting for audiences outside the USA but ... well, no no.I have been trying to get into your shows, got the free subscription with an iPhoneSomehow you are not getting it, planet of the apps and now this. Who's is your target audience? I guess you want to be as successful in TV as with the iPhone, well, there is no mass appeal with this one, take note from Netflix's Last Dance, a world wide Icon.If you were thinking about targeted audience in the USA, then my badI would love to see you do wonders and magic in TV, like with most of your products, a long way to go.Buy Disney, you have plenty of cash

This is a heartwarming show that reminds us that one person can change the world. It shows the ripple effect of inspirational people. Amazing people inspire other people to be amazing. It tells the stories of real people in a beautiful way. It reminds us that we can be the change we want to see in the world.

Review_title: I would give 0 if it was possible
Review_Text: Nothing to see here, I even dont know what is this.

Famous trailblazers of all backgrounds and ages tell the incredible and rewarding stories of their rich lives and achievements while reading letters from the people they inspired to do good for themselves and their communities. Five hours of heart-stopping, incredibly profound human stories of both the famous figures and these people. Hoping for a second season!

Review_title: Everyone needs to hear these stories!
Review_Text: Amazing Letters! Amazing Stories! I cried during most episodes thanks to these amazing people sharing their unique yet relatable story which are important to hear!!

Review_title: More famous people patting there own backs.
Review_Text: Nothing worth seeing here folks, move on... Just Apple trying to sell more itunes and other crap.

Review_title: Apple should stick to computers and phones not TV shows!!!!!
Review_Text: I thought this show was lame and even with a run time of 30 mins that only 25 mins two long. The frist few episodes rather boring! Did I say the episodes run for only 30 minutes?? However when I watched Season 1 Episode 6, I know this was show about nothing as it was a about Sesame Street Big Bird!
